snippet: FX confirmed Friday that it had picked up a sixth season of that biker gang drama.
abstract: FX confirms that it has picked up a sixth season of the biker gang television drama series Sons of Anarchy.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: FX confirmed Friday that it had picked up a sixth season of that biker gang drama.

headline.main: ‘Sons of Anarchy’ Has Room to Grow
headline.print_headline: ‘Sons of Anarchy’ Has Room to Grow
